titleStmt.title: Von Ludwig Wittgenstein an William Eccles, [12. 9. 1925]
titleStmt.author: Wittgenstein, Ludwig

sourceDesc.p: Kopie im BA (Nedo, 1983, S. 194). Publiziert (Eccles, S. 62f.; deutsch: Briefe, S. 155).

list.item: 2007/06: Conversion from Folio Flat File to XML

div.p: D.E., I'm trying the old job again as you can gather from this postcard. However I don' t feel so miserabel now, as I have decided to come to you if the worst came to the worst; which it certainly will sooner or later. Please remember me to your wife, give my affectionate greetings to your children and give Hugh a sound thrashing in my name.
